name: Modulars For You Kitchen
shortDescription: An interactive 3D kitchen planner that lets users design, customize, and visualize modular kitchens online.
fullDescription:
Modulars For You Kitchen is a web-based modular kitchen design and visualization tool inspired by modern kitchen planners. It allows users to create their dream kitchen layout using an intuitive drag-and-drop interface and view it in both 2D and 3D modes.

Key Features:

  • 2D and 3D Design Modes: Plan layouts in 2D and instantly switch to a realistic 3D preview.
  • Customizable Layouts: Create, edit, and arrange cabinets, countertops, and appliances to fit your space.
  • Material and Color Selection: Experiment with multiple finishes and color combinations for walls, furniture, and flooring.
  • Real-Time Cost Estimation: View estimated pricing updates as you modify your design.
  • Save and Share Projects: Save your kitchen designs and share them with others using a unique project code.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Designed for easy use by homeowners, interior designers, and retailers alike.

Create and visualize your ideal modular kitchen directly from your browser with precision and style.
